subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Giant Moon held off Spanky Fischbein by one and three-quarter lengths to win the $78,950 Damon Runyon Stakes for New York-bred 2-year-olds at Aqueduct.The colt, trained by Rich Schosberg, remained unbeaten in three starts by pulling clear in the deep stretch. His time was 1 minute 46.07 seconds for a mile and a sixteenth.
